venue.name: John F. Kennedy Presidential Library & Museum

item.description:
I thought it would be fun to have special outing for Boston ASL meetup group!

We will be going to John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum in Boston, Massachusetts.

We will meet in lobby of museum at 11 am then we can explore in museum.

 

Transportation: Take Red Line train to JFK/UMass stop then take shuttle to JFK Museum.

Also, you can drive. There's really nice parking lots for tourists!

 

Rule: No voice! This is challenge to pretend to be a Deaf tourist! All videos are captioned!

Looking forward to see all of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at lobby at 11 am! Look for flying hands
item.name: ASL meetup trip to John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum
